name: MirrorMirror
0:
”Alexa, open mirror mirror.”
”Alexa, ask mirror mirror to give me a mirror mirror fact”
”Alexa, tell mirror mirror to give me a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mirror mirror
des: Mirror Mirror would praise your beauty. This is an idea taken from the magical mirror from Snow White. So, all you need to do is asking Mirror mirror how beautiful you are!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
